entities.name: world cup
entities.description: The World Cup is mentioned as a 'thing' that Harry can go to. It's an event where Quidditch teams compete.

entities.name: weasleys

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story and is being given permission to go to the World Cup by his aunt.

entities.name: dudley dursley
entities.description: Dudley Dursley is Harry's cousin who is lurking behind the door trying to overhear Harry's conversation.
